src:
Ｊ２長崎・高田明社長、退任へ…経営危機で１７年に就任

02 Nov 2019, 04:22

　サッカーＪ２、Ｖ・ファーレン長崎の運営会社の高田明社長（７０）が退任する意向を固めたことが２日、分かった。近く発表する予定。
　運営会社は、前経営体制下にあった２０１７年シーズン開幕前に経営危機が表面化。通販大手「ジャパネットホールディングス」（長崎県佐世保市）が子会社化して立て直しを図ることになり、「ジャパネットたかた」創業者の高田氏が同年４月、社長に就任した。チームは同年のＪ２リーグで昇格を決め、１８年は初めてＪ１リーグで戦った。
text:
J2 Nagasaki and President Akira Takada to retire ... In 17 years due to management crisis

02 Nov 2019, 04:22

It was found on the 2nd that President Akira Takada (70), managing company of Soccer J2 and V. Fahren Nagasaki, decided to retire. It will be announced soon.
The management company faced a management crisis before the start of the 2017 season, which was under the previous management system. Mail order giant "Japanet Holdings" (Sasebo City, Nagasaki Prefecture) will become a subsidiary, and the company will be rebuilt. The team was promoted in the J2 league of the same year and in 18 years fought in the J1 league for the first time.
